R

requestFriend(String, String) - Static method in class stratego.server.DBManager
this makes a request that will create a new row in the friend table with the user's id as the first element and the friends id as the second and the accepted value as false
requestFriendsList() - Method in class stratego.network.Networker
 
resizable() - Method in class stratego.mode.Mode
returns the Resizable property of this object
run() - Method in class stratego.application.Background
this runs the loop that will set the next mode when the current one ends, To set the mode it makes Stratego display it, and the starts that modes Worker.
run() - Method in class stratego.mode.ModeWorker
this method is set up to run all request from the Mode as well and pass all packets from the network to the handlePacket Method, it also runs anything added to the todo list for the Worker
run() - Method in class stratego.network.Networker
 
run() - Method in class stratego.server.PacketHandler
decodes the packet and responds accordingly
run() - Method in class stratego.server.StrategoServer
creates and sends a packet.

setPrefHeight(double) - Method in class stratego.mode.Mode

setPrefWidth(double) - Method in class stratego.mode.Mode
sets the Prefered width of the Mode, the Mode will be displayed with this width when it is shown.
setResizable(boolean) - Method in class stratego.mode.Mode
This sets the resizable parameter of this Mode, this will prevent the application from being resized while this Mode is Active.
setRunning(boolean) - Method in class stratego.mode.ModeWorker
sets the value of the running field, once running is set to false the run method will exit after the it finishes checking the todo list as well as the packet list from the Network

setTodo(Runnable[]) - Method in class stratego.mode.ModeWorker
this sets the todo array for the ModeWorker, this is an array of runnables that will be executed after the request from the UI are processed and before the Network is checked for packets

sets the worker object for this mode.
